Reference

Basic hamlet functions

Core idea of the package.

hypo_anno_l()

Add a left facing hamlet to a ggplot

hypo_anno_r()

Add a right facing hamlet to a ggplot

hypo_anno_single()

One single hamlet legend element

hypo_anno_pair()

One paired hamlet legend element

hypo_anno_pair_split()

One paired hamlet legend element with two fills

hypo_legend_single()

Constructs a legend of single hamlets

hypo_legend_pair()

Constructs a legend of paired hamlets

hypo_legend_pair_split()

Constructs a legend of paired hamlets with two fills

hypo_hamlet_generic()

Add a generic hamlet to a ggplot

hypo_coral_generic()

Add a generic coral to a ggplot

Basic flagg functions

Functions dealing with Caribbean flaggs.

hypo_flag_test()

Display a single flags

hypo_flag_palette()

Display available flags

hypo_anno_flag()

Add a flag to a ggplot

hypo_anno_flag_single()

One single flag legend element

hypo_anno_flag_pair()

One paired flag legend element

hypo_legend_flag_single()

Constructs a legend of single flags

hypo_legend_flag_pair()

Constructs a legend of paired flags

Geom grob functions

Introducing facettable annotations.

geom_hypo_grob()

Provides the grob geom

Image metadata functions

Writing and reading metadata to/from exported plots.

hypo_save()

Add metadata to exported plots

hypo_show_metadata()

Read metadata from an exported plot

Prepacked colors

Color sets and color functions.

clr2

two colors

clr5

five colors

clr_darken()

Programmatically darken colors

clr_lighten()

Programmatically lighten colors
